----------------------------------------
VALIDATION CHECKLIST
----------------------------------------

[ ] Trade_ID matches backtest worksheet
[ ] Options ticker format is valid (O:TICKER...)
[ ] Entry/Exit prices are within reasonable range
[ ] PnL_Dollars matches (Exit - Entry) * 100
[ ] Option_R calculation uses correct underlying risk
[ ] R_Multiplier = Option_R / Underlying_R
[ ] Win column matches PnL direction

----------------------------------------
ANALYSIS FOCUS AREAS
----------------------------------------

1. OPTIONS VS EQUITY COMPARISON
   - Do options amplify R-multiples as expected?
   - What is the average R multiplier (options R / equity R)?
   - Which trades benefit most from options leverage?

2. CONTRACT SELECTION QUALITY
   - Are first ITM contracts providing good fills?
   - Do CALL vs PUT performance differ significantly?
   - Is expiration selection (2+ days out) appropriate?

3. FAILURE ANALYSIS
   - Why do some trades have NO_CHAIN or NO_CONTRACT?
   - Are there patterns in failed option lookups?
   - Should we relax/tighten contract selection criteria?

4. RISK/REWARD OPTIMIZATION
   - Is options trading improving overall system performance?
   - What is the net R contribution from options?
   - Should we trade options on all entries or filter?

================================================================================
END OF OPTIONS ANALYSIS REPORT
================================================================================
